message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale. I think it's quite valuable, so I'm starting the price at $150. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only willing to pay $100 for it. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
Hi Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I appreciate you valuing the item, however, I can't go as low as $100.  Would you consider $125?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but I'm still unable to meet at $125. Would you consider $110?
